did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Arel Lucas Papers relating to Timothy Leary,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Correspondence with Leary, business correspondence about publishing projects, biographical material (including a typescript by Barbara Leary), typescripts of various Leary works, photographs, newsclippings, a poster, and publications (including INNERSPACE, 1966, and ROBERT ANTON WILSON'S TRAJECTORIES NEWSLETTER, Autumn, 1996).

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on access.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Arel Lucas Papers Relating to Timothy Leary. M1291. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Starting in 1978 Arel Lucas worked for Timothy Leary typing manuscripts and doing general clerical work. She later was involved with the GAME OF LIFE book and Leary's autobiography.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content Summary
scopecontent.p: Correspondence with Leary, business correspondence about publishing projects, biographical material (including a typescript by Barbara Leary), typescripts of various Leary works, photographs, newsclippings, a poster, and publications (including INNERSPACE, 1966, and ROBERT ANTON WILSON'S TRAJECTORIES NEWSLETTER, Autumn, 1996).

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: American literature--20th century.
controlaccess.title: Innerspace.
Robert Anton Wilson's Trajectories Newsletter.
